name: Heat Croak
description:
Description:

Heat Croak is a highspeed 2d platformer where you are a frog and need to collect gems and pop balloons to gain heat to stay alive

The game features a single level with several branching paths 

The game also features a ranking system based on how much heat you have at the end of the stage

Controls:

Jump - Lets you Jump (duh), Double Jump and Homing Attack nearby Balloons

Lightspeed - When near a trail of Gems you dash through all of the trail, You can cancel the lightspeed dash at any point with a double jump which will carry the momentum from the dash for a little while which is very necessary for an S rank.

Walking - Do I even need to explain this one?
